original: Frid, Carl, läroverksadjunkt, Göteborg, f. 19/2/02 i ’Gbg av J. G. Frid o. h. h., f. Olsson. G. 39 m. Hanna Christina Bergman. Barn: Bo f. 40, Kerstin 42, Ingemar 46. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs h. latin 21, fil. kand. i Gbg 26, fil. mag. 27, provår v. Gbgs folksk:-sem. 36-37. E. o. ämneslär. v. Klippans komm. mellansk. 30-31, e. lär. i Khppan 31-36, v. Gbgs h. real 37-38, e. o. adj. v. Vasa h. a. 1. i Gbg 38-40, v. Gbgs östra realsk. 40-41, adj. i mo-dersm. o. tyska där sed. 41. Resor t. Danm. 35, Tyskl. 38.
translated: Frid, Carl, high school teacher, Gothenburg, born February 19, 1902 in Gothenburg, son of J.G. Frid and H.H. Frid (born Olsson). Married Hanna Christina Bergman in 1939. Children: Bo (born 1940), Kerstin (born 1942), Ingemar (born 1946). Graduated from Gothenburg Latin School in 1921, Bachelor of Arts degree from Gothenburg University in 1926, Master of Arts degree in 1927, teaching internship at Gothenburg Teachers' College in 1936-1937. Temporary subject teacher at Klippan Municipal Intermediate School in 1930-1931, teacher in Klippan from 1931-1936, temporary teacher at Gothenburg High School in 1937-1938, substitute high school teacher at Vasa High School in Gothenburg from 1938-1940, teacher at Gothenburg Eastern Real School from 1940-1941, and high school teacher of Swedish and German at the same school since 1941. Traveled to Denmark in 1935 and Germany in 1938.

jobTitle.name: High School Teacher of Swedish and German
